about_the_game:
Experience the full “British Isles Campaign” In this demo version of Grit and Valor – 1949.

Pit your mech squad against wave after wave of Axis forces in a valiant attempt to Liberate the nation. Gather resources and XP along the way to upgrade your mechs and level-up your chosen pilots back at Resistance Base.

Should you and your crew make it to the end of the run, you’ll need to make one last stand against General Harmsworth and his kaiju-sized boss mech!

Demo Features:

  • British Isles Campaign

  • British Isles Boss Level

  • 4 Unique Pilots

  • 6 Unlockable Mechs

  • Gameplay optimisations based on player feedback

Additional Notes:

  • Certain aspects of this demo version may differ from the final game.

  • Please follow our Steam community and social channels for updates.

About the Final Product:

IT'S 1949; WORLD WAR II RAGES ON
Europe is on its knees. Deadly Axis Mechs patrol the landscape, intimidating the populace and flushing out rebels. Survivors are few, but have regrouped under the new flag of The Resistance.

You are the free world’s last hope. Your deadly mission; deliver a devastating EMP weapon into the heart of enemy territory to turn the tide of the war.

content_descriptors.notes:
Grit and Valor - 1949 features mature content not appropriate for all ages.

Realistic depictions of War, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 / Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060 / Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A dieselpunk real-time tactics roguelite set in an alt-history World War 2. In this Demo version of Grit and Valor – 1949, you’ll take command of an elite Mech Squadron in an against-the-odds campaign to Liberate the British Isles!
